Direct message the job poster from Kelly Technology Inc.
Nora Howard-Cooper
Committed to connecting people to work that enriches their lives.
Kelly Technology has an opening for a REMOTE Permanent Director of Data Analytics to work with our client. Agency or Media experience required SUMMARYThe director of data analytics strives is responsible for driving client analytics and delivering recommendations to our clients. The desired candidate is a trusted and highly collaborative thought leader that can work cross-functionally with a variety of people and work styles achieving innovative results. This person will identify and understand our client's business challenges and goals by employing data to inform media and messaging recommendations. Additionally, this candidate will closely collaborate with our internal teams to develop and support our client’s data-driven digital media strategy and drive measurable business outcomes.RESPONSIBILITIESCommunicate data and insights in a compelling way, creating clear and inspiring presentations of approach, findings and recommendations that directly inform the overarching strategyDevelop core growth analysis and critical metrics to evaluate client performance and strategic initiativesProvide insights to support data-driven decisions such as building and sharing dashboards, communicating, and collaborating with internal stakeholders, helping to answer questions and uncover trends and actionable insights across the businessLead client engagement calls to present recommendations and insightsContinuously identify new ways to utilize data to fuel media and messaging decisions, helping to plan content, and activation teams make more data-led recommendationsBuild trusting, collaborative relationships with clients and be able to challenge, persuade and present POV convincinglyCollaborates with cross-functional partners, to ensure we are delivering best practice to our clients and leveraging all our experience, thought leadership and proprietary data to drive maximum valueEnsure quality, creativity and integrity of all services provided, as well as timeliness across all deliveries from teamMaintain a strong understanding of our evolving data warehouse REQUIREMENTSBachelor’s degree in business, finance, analytics, or related field7-10 years of progression in data analytics, finance, or corporate strategyStrong communication and presentation skillsAgency or Media experience requiredExperience in marketing, data analysis, data science or related field (required)Experience with SQL, MySQL, PostgreSQL, or other database systemsExperience in Looker, Tableau, or other business intelligence platformsExperience in R studio, STATA, SPSS, Python, or other statistical modeling softwareWorking knowledge of digital marketing channels, their strategic, and tactical impact on marketing and business goals, with an emphasis on increasing client ROIIf you are qualified and interested, please email your resume to norh098@kellyit.com
